meanings.definition: At a very fast tempo in music.
meanings.sent1: The orchestra played prestissimo to finish the piece on time.
meanings.sent2: She ran prestissimo to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel climbed the tree prestissimo to escape the chasing dog.
meanings.sent4: Time flew prestissimo during the exciting concert.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled prestissimo through the night, creating a haunting melody.

meanings.sent1: He typed prestissimo to meet the deadline for his report.
meanings.sent2: The car sped prestissimo down the highway.
meanings.sent3: The chef chopped the vegetables prestissimo, impressing the customers with his speed.
meanings.sent4: The news spread prestissimo throughout the small town.
meanings.sent5: The rabbit hopped prestissimo across the field, leaving a blur of fur behind.
